docs.title: Home
docs.text: description: Tools we use for work and task management

docs.title: Tech Stack
docs.text: These are the software tools we are currently using. We will keep exploring better tools and build our own tools as time goes on.

docs.title: Communication
docs.text: • Teams: you should be added once you join Gradel

docs.title: Robotics
docs.text:
• Robot Studio: for controlling the robots

Download Robot Studio

  • Rhino+Grasshopper: for modeling and simulation of customized tool paths

Download Rhino

  • Robot Components: Grasshopper plug-in for robot simulation

Download Robot Components

docs.title: Programming
docs.text:
• Python: for customizing and automating tasks.
  • RAPID code: ABB robot language
  • git: for version control

docs.title: Code Hosting and Documentation
docs.text:
• GitHub: for hosting project codes and documentations. The main branch of each repo should contain all the codes that are final and kept clean

Link to our GitHub organization

docs.text:
• GitHub: for hosting project codes and documentations. The main branch of each repo should contain all the codes that are final and kept clean

Link to our GitHub organization

• Cleaning of the Lab

  • Using of the Excel Sheet:

    • RoboticsTeam_Follow-up.xlsm
    • @ P:\08 - ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT\54_LW-RootFolder_r1\60_3M METHODS\20-Robotics
    • Update the task status and hours spent on each project

  • Weekly Highlights:

    • Wednesday: Presentation for Robot Setup & automatization (Internal check in Tuesday Afternoon)
    • Friday: Presentation for Robot Calibration considerations (Internal check in Friday Morning)
    • Calibration of ATTIC Ring
    • Looking for Interns (Software/Data/Computational/Robotics)
